players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Everyone, I investigated Bob last night and discovered he's the mafioso. We must vote him out to protect the town!"
Charlie: "I think we should discuss Diana's claim more. Bob, do you have anything to say?"
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. I know Diana is suspicious of me, but she's wrong. I have no reason to harm anyone else."
Charlie: "Bob, your confession to being the mafioso and killing Alice confirms Diana's claim. We should all vote for you to protect the town."
